# About {background-color="white"}

This presentation is made with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) (scientific and technical publishing system) and [Revealjs](https://revealjs.com/) (HTML presentation framework)

# Basic navigation {.smaller background-color="white"}

Basic navigation is done using the following keyboard shortcuts:

| Action                     | Keys                                       |
|----------------------------|--------------------------------------------|
| Next slide                 | `→` or `SPACE` or `N` |
| Previous slide             | `←` or `P`                  |
| Navigate without fragments | Windows `Alt→` and `Alt←`, Mac: `Ctrl→` and `Ctrl←`           |
| Jump to first/last slide   | `Shift→` and `Shift←`      |
| Overview of all slides     | `Esc` or `o`       |

# Navigation Menu {background-color="white"}

- You can access the navigation menu using the button located in the bottom left corner of the presentation.

- You can also press `m` to toggle the menu open and closed.

![](/images/menu.png)

## Jump to slides

- Clicking the button (or press `m`) opens a slide navigation menu that enables you to easily jump to any slide

![](/images/navigation.png)


# Save presention as PDF {background-color="white" .smaller}


![](/images/pdf.png)


- Access the navigation menu using the button located in the bottom left corner of the presentation and select **Tools**. 

- Select **PDF Export Mode** (this may take a few seconds)

- Use your Browser to save the slide as PDF (it is recommended to use [Google Chrome](https://www.google.com/intl/de_de/chrome/))


# Print presentation  {background-color="white"}

- Simply follow the steps described in "Save presention as PDF" 
- Print the PDF  

# More options

## Zoom into slide

- Hold down the `Alt` key (or `Ctrl`) and click on any element to zoom towards it.

## Chalkboard and notes canvas

- Press `b` to toggle the chalkboard.
- Press `c` to toggle the notes canvas.
